overview: Savanna is one sexy mother...  The woman over 30. Her full swaying hips. Her tan, firm flesh. And showing just enough cleavage to suggest the mature bounty inside, but discrete enough to get through a PTA meeting. You so want to fuck her, but you'll have to wait until she's done with algebra homework first. Welcome to Milfwood, the cul de sac of your dreams. Where not one, but ten incredible, beautiful, horny milfs grab the paper in sheer robes that tend to open, bend over to pick up groceries and expose milky white thighs, and tan behind fences just short enough for you to peer over. Could they be teasing you on purpose? Duh...this is Milfwood, not Mayberry. And your wood belongs in Milfwood!
title: Milfwood USA
